languages.text: "С удовольствием поговорю с глубокоуважаемым Корнелиусом Драйвстемом. Ради душевного спокойствия его отца — наедине".
"It would be my pleasure to speak to the esteemed Cornelius Drivestem. In private, for his father's peace of mind."
languages.original_text: "С удовольствием поговорю с глубокоуважаемым Корнелиусом Драйвстемом. Ради душевного спокойствия его отца — наедине".

traits.locale_text: "I will happily talk to the esteemed Cornelius Drivestem. In private — for the peace of mind of his father."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I will happily talk to the esteemed Cornelius Drivestem. In private — for the peace of mind of his father."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I will eagerly talk to the esteemed Cornelius Drivestem. In private, for his father's peace of mind."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I will eagerly talk to the esteemed Cornelius Drivestem. In private, for his father's peace of mind."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "It would be my pleasure to speak to the esteemed Cornelius Drivestem. In private, for his father's peace of mind."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "It would be my pleasure to speak to the esteemed Cornelius Drivestem. In private, for his father's peace of mind."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: 「尊敬うけしコーネリアス・ドライブステンと是非、話をしたいものだ。お父上の心の平穏のためにも、こっそりとな」
languages.original_text: "It would be my pleasure to speak to the esteemed Cornelius Drivestem. In private, for his father's peace of mind."

traits.locale_text: 「尊敬うけしコーネリアス・ドライブステンと是非、話をしたいものだ。お父上の心の平穏のためにも、こっそりとな」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: “我很愿意与尊敬的科尼利厄斯·德莱夫斯塔聊一聊。为了让他的父亲放心，我们可以私下聊。”
languages.original_text: "It would be my pleasure to speak to the esteemed Cornelius Drivestem. In private, for his father's peace of mind."

traits.locale_text: “我很乐意与尊敬的科尼利厄斯·德莱夫斯塔聊一聊。为了让他的父亲放心，我们可以私下聊。”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: « Je me ferais un plaisir de discuter avec l'honorable Cornelius Drivestem. En privé, pour ne pas indisposer son père. »
languages.original_text: "It would be my pleasure to speak to the esteemed Cornelius Drivestem. In private, for his father's peace of mind."

traits.locale_text: « Je me ferais un plaisir de discuter avec l'honorable Cornelius Drivestem. En privé, pour ne pas indisposer son père. »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: «Hablaré con Cornelius Drivestem con mucho gusto. En privado, para la tranquilidad de su padre».
languages.original_text: "It would be my pleasure to speak to the esteemed Cornelius Drivestem. In private, for his father's peace of mind."

traits.locale_text: «Hablaré con Cornelius Drivestem con mucho gusto. En privado, para la tranquilidad de su padre».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Es wäre mir ein Vergnügen mit dem ehrenwerten Cornelius Drivestem zu sprechen. Unter vier Augen, um seinen Vater nicht zu belasten."
languages.original_text: "It would be my pleasure to speak to the esteemed Cornelius Drivestem. In private, for his father's peace of mind."

traits.locale_text: "Ich werde mit dem geschätzten Cornelius Drivestem sprechen. Unter vier Augen, um seinen Vater nicht zu belasten."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Muteber Cornelius Drivestem ile konuşmaktan memnun olurum. Babasını düşünerek bunun özel bir görüşme olması gerektiği kanaatindeyim."
languages.original_text: "It would be my pleasure to speak to the esteemed Cornelius Drivestem. In private, for his father's peace of mind."

traits.locale_text: "Muteber Cornelius Drivestem ile konuşmaktan memnun olurum. Babasını düşünerek bunun özel bir görüşme olması gerektiği kanaatindeyim."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion
